channel.title: Teardown of my $1k MRR business
channel.description:
Hi all,
I recorded a 10 min video that explains in detail how I built one of my businesses. It currently makes $1k in monthly profits. I did this simply to share my experiences, with like-minded people like you:
https://youtu.be/vZmUlXFDYVQ
Cheers, Michael

item.title: Teardown of my $1k MRR business
item.dc:creator: mherrmann
item.description:
Hi Steve, I’m afraid there isn’t a transcript as of yet. But I’ll take what you wrote as feedback that 1) I should tell earlier in the video what the business does and 2) provide a transcript.

Read full topic

item.title: Teardown of my $1k MRR business
item.dc:creator: SteveMcLeod
item.description:
Hey Michael, is there a transcript? If so, perhaps it is worth posting too?

I watched the video for a while but got stopped before I discovered what the business is. I had no idea how much more video to watch to find out.

Read full topic
